summary: AN ORDINANCE adding a new section 2-A to Ordinance 110998 relating to the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program year January 1, 1983 through December 31, 1983; creating an interim use project and authorizing the implementation of said project by the Department of Community Development through the making of a loan; and authorizing the Department of Community Development to enter into agreements necessary to effect the project; and appropriating funds from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund.
